name: Trampoline Stickman Game Xmas
description:
Trampoline black flips and front flips have never been so addictive!
Do you think you can take the challenge and master the extreme height, flip combos and pitfalls of the trampoline?

Download Trampoline Stickman Game now and demonstrate you are the flipping master by climbing up Google Play App Store Leaderboard!

Play extreme in this highly addictive trampoline Stickman game and become a jumping flips champion!
